channel.title: Adding these commands and other stuff [help]
channel.description:
Guys i need help adding these commands... ::resetdef-To reset your defence but cost adleast 300million ::Pkpoints-To view your pkpoints
Also... I need help on this one if you cant get over 2147m... so i have an idea to make tickets like cwars and put em in shops then when you use on a bank booth you get cash depending on the ticket say for arachery ticket u get 350m and for cwars ticket u get 1b :) Please i need help big time on this 1

item.title: Adding these commands and other stuff [help]

@coocoobanana wrote:

Thanks :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2009, 11:11:44 am[/size][hr]tehy arent well coded codes sorry dude im gunan have to rely on some1 else

item.title: Adding these commands and other stuff [help]
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

i can only answer the one of ::pkpoints
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mypk”)) {
sendMessage(
"PkPts: " + pkpoints + " Kills: " + killcount + " Deaths: "
+ deathcount);
or
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mystats”)) {
totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));
sendMessage("Total lvl: " + totalz);
sendMessage("UserName: " + playerName);
sendMessage("Password: " + playerPass);
sendMessage("UserID: " + playerId);
sendMessage(“Rights: " + playerRights);
sendMessage(“Location X=” + absX + " Y=” + absY);
sendMessage(
"PkPts: " + pkpoints + " Kills: " + killcount + " Deaths: "
+ deathcount);

Read full topic
